import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get ticket IDs for filter sets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/ids/for/filtersets"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves lists of ticket identifiers that match one or more filter set definitions. Use this to determine which tickets belong to specific saved views or criteria sets without performing a full search.

**Prerequisites**
1. **FilterSetIds** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/filters](/docs/api/filters/list-filters) to obtain identifiers for the filter sets you wish to evaluate.

**Workflow Example**
1. List filters: [GET /api/v1.0/filters](/docs/api/filters/list-filters) → extract `Items[].FilterSetId`.
2. Apply filter sets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/ids/for/filtersets](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-ids-for-filter-sets) with the collected IDs to find matching tickets.
3. (Optional) Inspect matches: Use the returned `MatchedIds` with breadcrumb or detail APIs to retrieve ticket metadata.

**Minimal Required Fields**: FilterSetIds

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for retrieving entity IDs belonging to specific filter sets.","properties":{"FilterSetIds":{"type":"array","description":"List of filter set identifiers to evaluate.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"IdsToProcess":{"type":"array","description":"Optional subset of entity IDs to restrict the evaluation to.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"nullable":true},"IgnoreFilterSetsWithNoConditions":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, filter sets without conditions are skipped.","default":false},"OnlyReturnFirstMatch":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, stops after the first matching filter set.","default":false}},"title":"GetIdsForFilterSetRequest"},"example":{"FilterSetIds":["3fd41b5e-8a3b-4f5d-9033-2bb5f0b16c22"],"IgnoreFilterSetsWithNoConditions":true}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Matching IDs retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Result entry mapping a filter set to the entity IDs that match its conditions.","properties":{"FilterSetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Filter set identifier."},"MatchedIds":{"type":"array","description":"List of entity identifiers that matched the filter set.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}},"title":"IdsForFilterSetsResponse"}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
